title: LOVECRAFT COUNTRY Ending Explained! Review, Breakdown and Season 2 Theories!
author: Think Story
comment:
🙏Thanks for sticking with me throughout the whole season!🙏 If you want to check out more of vids try...
Lovecraft Country Breakdowns: http://y2u.be/k0J8wLNCR-4
Horror Breakdowns :http://y2u.be/VH7YEY0GWZk

I think “they still haven’t learned” was referring to black people. When Dee was reading the story there was something said that blood would have to be spilled. Yet Tic’s family left Christina alive. Black people always have mercy and forgiveness in their heart, especially for their oppressors and I think Dee isn’t gonna be one of those passive black ppl. She’s gonna be militant and will do what’s necessary to protect black people.
When D says “They still haven’t learned” she’s actually referring to her family. They should have known better than to leave Christina alive.

Letty: magic is ours now

Random white witch in England: weird, why aren't my potions working anymore.....
The ruby reference “life could be a dream” completely went over my head.
description:
In this video I take a look at HBO Max's latest supernatural horror show "Lovecraft Country" and explain its ending as well as some of the theories for season 2! Check it out as I breakdown and review this great show!
